languages.text: {n}Черты лица Торбальда тяжелеют.{/n} "После ухода Зловещего воя я — старший между Волками Простора. Я — альфа, и мой долг велит заботиться, чтобы ни один из избранных воинов Всеотца не пал глупо и напрасно. Даже Ульфар".

{n}Thorbald's face seems to sag under a sudden weight.{/n} "When the Baleful Howl left, I became the highest-ranking Wolf in the Expanse. I am the alpha, and it is my duty to ensure that not one of the Allfather's chosen warriors loses his life for foolish or fruitless ends. Not even Ulfar."
languages.original_text: {n}Черты лица Торбальда тяжелеют.{/n} "После ухода Зловещего воя я — старший между Волками Простора. Я — альфа, и мой долг велит заботиться, чтобы ни один из избранных воинов Всеотца не пал глупо и напрасно. Даже Ульфар".

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald's face seems to sag under a sudden weight.{/n} "When the Famehungry left, I became the highest-ranking Wolf in the Expanse. I am the alpha, and it is my duty to ensure that not one of the Allfather's chosen warriors loses his life for foolish or fruitless ends. Not even Ulfar."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

I am the alpha, and it is my duty to ensure that not one of the Allfather's chosen warriors loses his life for foolish or fruitless ends. Not even Ulfar."

I am the alpha, and it is my duty to ensure that not one of the Allfather's chosen warriors loses his life for foolish or fruitless ends. Not even Ulfar."

I am the alpha, and it is my duty to ensure that not one of the Allfather's chosen warriors loses his life for foolish or fruitless ends. Not even Ulfar."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}索巴德的脸垂了下来，仿佛某种沉重的负担突然压在了他身上。{/n}“怒嚎者离开之后，我就成了整个科罗努斯扩区地位最高的野狼。我是狼群的首领，我必须保护好全父选中的战士，阻止他们做出愚蠢的举动，制止他们踏上注定失败的征途，自取灭亡。即便是乌尔法，也不例外。”
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face seems to sag under a sudden weight.{/n} "When the Baleful Howl left, I became the highest-ranking Wolf in the Expanse. I am the alpha, and it is my duty to ensure that not one of the Allfather's chosen warriors loses his life for foolish or fruitless ends. Not even Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: {n}索巴德的脸垂了下来，仿佛某种沉重的负担突然压在了他身上。{/n}“渴名者离开之后，我就成了整个科罗努斯扩区地位最高的狼。我是狼群的首领，我必须保护好全父选中的战士，阻止他们做出愚蠢的举动，或踏上注定失败的征途，自取灭亡。即便是乌尔法，也不例外。”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}トールバルドの顔は、突然の精神的負担にがっかりしたように見える。{/n}「破滅の咆哮が去り、俺はエクスパンスで最高位の狼となった。俺はアルファだ。だから全知の父に選ばれた戦士の命は誰一人として、バカなことにも無駄なことにも使わせない義務がある。ウルファーも例外ではない」
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face seems to sag under a sudden weight.{/n} "When the Baleful Howl left, I became the highest-ranking Wolf in the Expanse. I am the alpha, and it is my duty to ensure that not one of the Allfather's chosen warriors loses his life for foolish or fruitless ends. Not even Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: {n}トールバルドの顔は、突然の精神的負担にがっかりしたように見える。{/n}「破滅の咆哮が去り、俺はエクスパンスで最高位の狼となった。俺はアルファだ。だから全知の父に選ばれた戦士の命は誰一人として、バカなことにも無駄なことにも使わせない義務がある。ウルファーも例外ではない」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Thorbald parece hundirse a causa de una lacra repentina.{/n} «Cuando se fueron los integrantes del Aullido Torvo, me convertí en el Lobo de mayor rango de toda la Extensión. Soy el alfa y, como tal, es mi deber asegurarme de que ningún guerrero elegido por el Padre de todas las cosas pierda la vida por necedad o cualquier fin fútil. Ni siquiera Ulfar».
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face seems to sag under a sudden weight.{/n} "When the Baleful Howl left, I became the highest-ranking Wolf in the Expanse. I am the alpha, and it is my duty to ensure that not one of the Allfather's chosen warriors loses his life for foolish or fruitless ends. Not even Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Thorbald parece hundirse a causa de una lacra repentina.{/n} «Cuando se fueron los Hambrientos de Fama, me convertí en el Lobo de mayor rango de toda la Extensión. Soy el alfa y, como tal, es mi deber asegurarme de que ningún guerrero elegido por el Padre de todas las cosas pierda la vida por necedad o cualquier fin fútil. Ni siquiera Ulfar».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Le visage de Thorbald semble s'affaisser sous un poids soudain.{/n} « Quand les Hurleurs sanguinaires sont partis, je suis devenu le Loup le plus haut gradé des Étendues. En tant qu'alpha, il est de mon devoir de veiller à ce qu'aucun des guerriers élus du Père de Tous ne perde la vie dans des entreprises futiles ou insensées. Pas même Ulfar. »
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face seems to sag under a sudden weight.{/n} "When the Baleful Howl left, I became the highest-ranking Wolf in the Expanse. I am the alpha, and it is my duty to ensure that not one of the Allfather's chosen warriors loses his life for foolish or fruitless ends. Not even Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de Thorbald semble s'affaisser sous un poids soudain.{/n} « Quand les Dévoreurs de gloire sont partis, je suis devenu le Loup le plus haut gradé des Étendues. En tant qu'alpha, il est de mon devoir de veiller à ce qu'aucun des guerriers élus du Père de Tous ne perde la vie dans des entreprises futiles ou insensées. Pas même Ulfar. »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbalds Gewicht scheint unter einer plötzlichen Last zusammenzusacken.{/n} "Als die Baleful Howl aufbrachen, wurde ich zum ranghöchsten Wolf in der Ausdehnung. Ich bin der Alpha, und es ist meine Pflicht, dafür zu sorgen, dass kein einziger der auserwählten Krieger des Allvaters sein Leben für törichte oder fruchtlose Ziele verliert. Nicht einmal Ulfar."
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face seems to sag under a sudden weight.{/n} "When the Baleful Howl left, I became the highest-ranking Wolf in the Expanse. I am the alpha, and it is my duty to ensure that not one of the Allfather's chosen warriors loses his life for foolish or fruitless ends. Not even Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbalds Gesicht sinkt ein wie durch ein plötzliches Gewicht.{/n} "Nach dem Aufbruch der Famehungry wurde ich zum ranghöchsten Wolf in der Ausdehnung. Ich bin der Alpha und es ist meine Pflicht, dafür zu sorgen, dass kein auserwählter Krieger des Allvaters sein Leben aus Dummheit oder für eine sinnlose Sache verliert. Nicht einmal Ulfar."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Thorbald'ın yüzü aniden asılıyor.{/n} "Uğursuz Uluma gittiğinde Enginlik'teki en üstün Kurt ben oldum. Ben alfayım, Yücebaba'nın seçilmiş savaşçılarından hiçbirinin aptalca ve amaçsızca hayatını kaybetmediğinden emin olmakla mükellefim. Söz konusu Ulfar olsa bile bu böyle."
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's face seems to sag under a sudden weight.{/n} "When the Baleful Howl left, I became the highest-ranking Wolf in the Expanse. I am the alpha, and it is my duty to ensure that not one of the Allfather's chosen warriors loses his life for foolish or fruitless ends. Not even Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald'ın yüzü aniden asılıyor{/n} "Uğursuz Uluma gittiğinde Enginlik'teki en üstün Kurt ben oldum. Ben alfayım ve Yücebaba'nın seçilmiş savaşçılarından hiçbirinin aptalca ve amaçsızca hayatını kaybetmediğine emin olmak benim görevim. Söz konusu Ulfar olsa bile."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil
